data.title: Outstanding
data.text: Lovely space. Streamlined clean and comfortable. Nice background music. Friendly staff. First sip of coffee was so yummy. I'm hooked.

data.title: Sure to come AROUND cafe & shop
data.text:
Just stopped for my first cup at Around Cafe, 2 weeks after it opened.
It is an amazing place! Instant fall in love with it. From the sweet baristas to the amazing selection (Cafe Avocado anyone? Einspänner in your face, Starbucks!). 
It has a nice vibe which I've experiences in similar places around East Asia. 
It is local. 
Great selections of coffees. The teas come from the highly respected Rishi line.
You prefer some boba instead? Check - they have unique combinations.
I saw few baked goods (a croissant caught my eye for sure).
Once you done you can take home the memory with some of their coffees beans or the chocolate (I haven't tried it yet).
There is a nice ambiance and free WiFi.
Gets my full support!
